p: Two resources were used to extract scientific names of the herbal substances. Composed by Ghahreman and Okhovvat, the first resource (“ SciResource1”) titled “Matching the Old Medicinal Plant Names with Scientific Terminology,” includes a history of medicinal plants, the methodology of using ancient texts on medicinal plants, the old medicinal plant names, and the identification of scientific names for plants [ 38]. The second resource (“SciResource2”) includes the appendix provided in the corrected edition of Makhzan al-Advieh (“MakhzanCE”), from which both scientific names and common names were extracted [ 37].
